Load the required packages:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mpg, aes(class)) + geom_bar()
```

```{r}
if (!reticulate::py_module_available('mofapy2')) {
  cat('mofapy2 unavailable ... \n ')
  
  py_conf <- unclass(reticulate::py_config()) 
  cat('required_module_path: \n')
  py_conf$required_module_path

  all_pys <- unclass(reticulate::py_config())$python_versions
  
  for (py in all_pys) {
    reticulate::use_python(py)
    reticulate::py_module_available('mofapy2')
  }
}
```
